nodes.text: Megasecurity Ward 23 was a secret vault that originally acted as a section of Belsavis prison and was later used by the Star Cabal. Its purpose was to store a number of weapons, technologies, and other treasures the organization had created and did not want released to the rest of the galaxy, including Microdroids and genetic maps. It was protected by the SCORPIO artificial intelligence droid.

The most respected members of the Star Cabal were kept in stasis in Kolto tanks in the Ward with one of their number being over 800 years old by 3641 BBY. These individuals were kept alive because of their experience even though they themselves lamented on how the Star Cabal had become subverted from its original purpose.
